message.name: INF_PROCESS_INSTANCE_NO_RECORDS
message.locale: No records found matching the search criteria specified

message.name: INF_PROCESS_INSTANCE_NO_COMBINED_SEARCH_SO_TASK_FIELD_USED
message.locale: The search fields cannot be combined, therefore the search was performed by Task ID.

message.name: INF_PROCESS_INSTANCE_NO_COMBINED_SEARCH_SO_USER_FIELD_USED
message.locale: The search fields cannot be combined, therefore the search was performed by Tasks Reserved By User.

message.name: INF_PROCESS_INSTANCE_NO_COMBINED_SEARCH_SO_CASE_FIELD_USED
message.locale: The search fields cannot be combined, therefore the search was performed by Tasks Associated with Case Reference.

message.name: ERR_NO_PROCESS_SEARCH_CRITERIA
message.locale: Please enter some search criteria

message.name: ERR_PROCESS_INSTANCE_MAX_RECORDS_EXCEEDED
message.locale: The amount of workflow process returned <%1s> has exceeded the upper threshold set for this search in the application <%2s> . Please provide additional search criteria.

message.name: ERR_PROCESS_INSTANCE_ERROR_MAX_RECORDS_EXCEEDED
message.locale: The amount of workflow process errors returned <%1s> has exceeded the upper threshold set for this search in the application <%2s> . Please provide additional search criteria.

message.name: ERR_DEFERRED_PROCESS_INSTANCE_ERROR_MAX_RECORDS_EXCEEDED
message.locale: The amount of deferred process errors returned <%1s> has exceeded the upper threshold set for this search in the application <%2s> . Please provide additional search criteria.

message.name: ERR_DEF_WF_PROCESS_INSTANCE_ERROR_MAX_RECORDS_EXCEEDED
message.locale: The amount of deferred process errors returned <%1s> and the number of workflow process errors returned <%2s> have exceeded their maximum thresholds <%3s> and <%4s> respectively. Please provide additional search criteria.

message.name: ERR_PROCESS_ENACTMENT_TO_DATE_LATER_THAN_FROM_DATE
message.locale: The process enactment from date must not be later than the process enactment to date.

message.name: ERR_PROCESS_COMPLETED_TO_DATE_LATER_THAN_FROM_DATE
message.locale: The process completed from date must not be later than the process completed to date.

message.name: ERR_PROCESS_TO_DATE_TIME_LATER_THAN_FROM_DATE_TIME
message.locale: The process start date time must not be later than the from date time.

message.name: ERR_PROCESS_ID_USED_FOR_SEARCH_WHEN_OTHER_VALUES_ARE_USED
message.locale: The process instance ID should not be allowed as a part of the search criteria if other values are set.

message.name: ERR_INCORRECT_DEFAULT_ALLOCATION_TARGETS_CANNOT_PARSE_RULE_SET
message.locale: The CER rule set document with the identifier "%1s" cannot be parsed.

message.name: ERR_THE_CER_ALLOCATION_RULE_SET_NOT_EXTEND_ABSTRACT_CER_ALLOCATION_RULE_SET
message.locale: The work allocation rule set %1s does not extend the abstract allocation targets rule set.

message.name: ERR_NO_VALID_PRIMARY_CLASS_FOUND_IN_THE_ABSTRACT_CER_ALLOCATION_RULE_SET
message.locale: The CER rule set with the identifier "%1s" does not contain a valid primary rule class required by workflow. A valid primary CER class is one that extends the abstract CER allocation targets class "%2s".

message.name: ERR_NO_TARGET_ATTRIBUTE_FOUND_IN_THE_CER_ALLOCATION_RULE_CLASS
message.locale: A workflow allocation CER primary rule class must contain an attribute "%1s". The following CER primary classes contained within the rule set with identifier "%2s" do not contain this attribute and are therefore invalid: "%3s".

message.name: ERR_NO_CER_RULE_CLASS_FOUND_IN_THE_CER_ALLOCATION_RULE_SET
message.locale: There are no rule classes present in the rule set with the identifier "%1s".

message.name: ERR_INCORRECT_DEFAULT_ALLOCATION_TARGETS_RULE_SET
message.locale: Incorrect default allocation targets rule set template is used for creating a new rule set.

message.name: ERR_NO_VALID_PRIMARY_CLASS_FOUND_IN_THE_CER_ALLOCATION_RULE_SET
message.locale: Cannot find the valid primary class in this CER allocation rule set %1s.
